channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Tika Ana!
channel.desc: Who would have thought fermented foods could be so good for your health? Watch as Hinewai and Hine Te Kura learn the secrets from the one and only Koro Rapaera Black in Te Wh?rua o Ruatoki! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Nanaia Mahuta, recognised for her formidability as the longest serving w?hine M?ori in Parliament, reveals that it has been her values and maternal nature that has been key to her success. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Episode 1
channel.desc: ?repa Simmons feels like her world is going crazy. Lacking all motivation for a future she?s been working towards for years, she's awakened when she receives a mysterious taonga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: After realising the generational disconnect caused by her father's adoption, Jordyn with a Why has dedicated herself to revitalising te reo M?ori within her wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Episode 2
channel.desc: ?repa finds herself drawn to the mysterious hei tiki, but she?s not the only one. Someone is lurking and listening to every development. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Nikora Edwards aka Swizl Jager, defies societal expectations in more ways than one and, through his music, explores the dynamics of not fitting the traditional mould. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: Drew heads to the heart of hockey in Nova Scotia, and then to the Six Nations playing fields as he explores how indigenous peoples quite literally invented both of Canada?s National Sports: Hockey and Lacrosse. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: As a wahine M?ori in the music industry, Raquel Abolins-Reid (Ng?ti Porou) aka Riiki Reid has a desire to have her taha M?ori represented as an integral part of her identity as an artist. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: The best Euchre players from Tainui battle it out for the title of Uka champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. The Panapa whanau show Pio around Te Mahurehure urban marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Hip-hop superstars Snotty Nose Rez Kids take us on an energetic romp as they share how Indigenous mural artists have transformed the city of Vancouver. Directed by Carla Robinson. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Nathaniel Howe shares the business side of music. (R).

channel.title: ?paki

channel.title: T?ku Reo

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora

channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: What is wairua? Answered from a M?ori perspective. Explanations about the wairua of human beings and the wairua contained in all living things everywhere. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: Following the lives of the New Zealand Waka Ama Elite Junior Men and Women's teams as they train their hearts out in the quest for gold at the 2022 IVF World Sprint Championships. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pae Kahurangi
channel.desc: Featuring Te Pae Kahurangi, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: R?rangi
channel.desc: Caz can't bring himself to enter his childhood home with Gerald; Caz gets drunk with his old high school boyfriend, who's more intrigued than shocked by Caz's transition (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: NEW: 5. Whales Are Known to Make Lifelong Friendships With the boys not talking to each other, Liz tries to get the group back together over text. Pua is nervous about her interview. Ma makes a risky move.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley
channel.desc: The Bones Ultimatum: H?ni makes an unlikely decision while Te P?hua stands on ceremony in the season finale of End Of The Valley. (R).

channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.title: T?karo Tribe

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: HEADSPACE
channel.desc: After a nanosized trio of crime-fighting aliens crash inside teenager Norman?s brain, they must work with him to thwart Zolthard, an intergalactic villain who?s invading Earth via the school principal?s mind. The film blends sci-fi antics with teen adventure.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Galapagos: Edge of the World
channel.desc: These isolated Galapogas islands are home to a staggeringly diverse array of creatures. From giant tortoises to penguins, the islands' unique wildlife inspired Darwin's Theory of Evolution. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Matau Bros Gone Fishing
channel.desc: A lifestyle series that follows hard-case M?ori anglers, Matene, Dazza and Jeff Cleave, as they fish for knowledge and food for the table. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: Kahurangi Malcolm was schooled in total immersion M?ori at Te Raki o Pukekohe and Te Kura Kaupapa M?ori o Waiuku. Te Reo M?ori is an important part of her wh?nau and has a huia feather in her cap. (R).

channel.desc: A day in the life of a retired bus driver as he reflects on his journey as a Samoan immigrant traversing the streets of Auckland and the work he does in the church and the community. (R).

channel.title: Journeyman

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te NGz
channel.desc: NEW: In a game of hide and seek, Moemiti, hidden underneath the plum tree, watches Ng?tai trying to find her. When a plum falls on Ng?tai's head making Moemiti laugh! Ngatai finds her sis, and an abundance of plums! What do they do to make sure the plums don?t go to waste.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te NGz
channel.desc: NEW: Just another day on the p?mu, Te NGz are out on the back porch playing a game, when Benji comes running through leaving his muddy footprints behind him. The girls know if they don't wash him, P?p? is going to be H?H?.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ngau Tuar?
channel.desc: NEW: Coasters, Chaos, and the Clash of the Taiaha ? It?s all screams, laughs, and white-knuckle grips at Rainbow?s End. Pem Bird, Chris Winitana, and Wasi turn Pictionary into a chaotic masterpiece. The boys put their mau r?kau skills to the test.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pukunati Lose Weight Or Die
channel.desc: NEW: Faren confronts internalised shame and stigma. Obesity survivors expose the backlash and misunderstanding around bariatric surgery.

channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: After Sherman
channel.desc: Returning to the coastal South Carolina land that his family purchased after emancipation, filmmaker Jon-Sesrie Goff's desire to explore his Gullah/Geechee roots transforms into a poetic investigation of Black inheritance, trauma, and generational wisdom, amidst the violent tensions that define America's collective history. (R).

channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.desc: A great horse adventure across Aotearoa, meeting our amazing horses and riders of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: The Brothers of Tangaroa go for a dive on the Kapiti Coast and Korey Gibson heads to Kaik?ura in search of food for goat curry. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. The boys visit Kakahi to hunt and gather with Beulah's father-in-law, but things don't go as planned. (R).

channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: REWIND is a music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. It also has old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: All Black hero Piri Weepu combines his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).
